trans-unit.source: Converts <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State"></xref> objects from one data type to another.
You should never create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter> class.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter"></xref> class.

Returns whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter"></xref> can convert an object of the specified type to an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State"></xref>, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type from which to convert.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Returns whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter"></xref> can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type from which to convert.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.StateConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
This member overrides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
This member overrides <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
If `null` is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert the value parameter to.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
destinationType is `null`.
